statements: SELECT * FROM AdPerformance WHERE advertiser_id = 1
SELECT ad_creative_id, impressions FROM AdPerformance WHERE clicks > 10
SELECT advertiser_id, ad_creative_id, conversions FROM AdPerformance WHERE conversions < 5
SELECT targeting_strategy_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM AdPerformance GROUP BY targeting_strategy_id
SELECT MAX(clicks) AS max_clicks FROM AdPerformance
SELECT advertiser_id, ad_creative_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM AdPerformance WHERE advertiser_id = 1 ORDER BY clicks DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM AdPerformance WHERE impressions > 1000 AND clicks < 100 ORDER BY ad_creative_id ASC
SELECT SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM AdPerformance
SELECT ad_creative_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM AdPerformance GROUP BY ad_creative_id HAVING SUM(impressions) > 500
SELECT DISTINCT advertiser_id, targeting_strategy_id FROM AdPerformance WHERE conversions > 0 ORDER BY advertiser_id, targeting_strategy_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Advertisers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT performance_metric, performance_value FROM PerformanceTracking WHERE performance_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT DISTINCT advertiser_id FROM PerformanceTracking WHERE performance_metric = 'Clicks';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceTracking ORDER BY performance_value DESC, performance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Advertisers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceTracking WHERE performance_value > 1000;
SELECT advertiser_id, creative_id, performance_date FROM PerformanceTracking WHERE targeting_strategy = 'segmented';
SELECT DISTINCT advertiser_id, targeting_strategy FROM PerformanceTracking WHERE performance_metric = 'CTR';
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, advertiser_id FROM advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT creative_name, click_count, impression_count FROM ad_creatives WHERE click_count > 100 ORDER BY click_count DESC, impression_count ASC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM targeting_strategies WHERE target_audience LIKE '%parents%' ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives WHERE advertiser_id = 2 AND impression_count > 500 ORDER BY impression_count DESC;
SELECT advertiser_name, advertiser_id FROM advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT creative_name, click_count, impression_count FROM ad_creatives WHERE advertiser_id = 1 ORDER BY impression_count DESC, click_count ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM targeting_strategies WHERE advertiser_id = 2 ORDER BY strategy_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives JOIN advertisers ON ad_creatives.advertiser_id = advertisers.advertiser_id WHERE impression_count > 100 ORDER BY impression_count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT advertiser_name, strategy_name FROM advertisers JOIN targeting_strategies ON advertisers.advertiser_id = targeting_strategies.advertiser_id WHERE target_audience LIKE '%young%' ORDER BY advertiser_name ASC, strategy_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT id, name, industry FROM advertisers WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT ad_name, budget, start_date FROM ads WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT ad_type, sum(clicks) FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_type;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM targeting_strategies ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE industry = 'Retail';
SELECT ad_name, budget FROM ads WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM targeting_strategies WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id HAVING total_impressions > 1000;
SELECT ads.ad_name, ad_performance.impressions FROM ads JOIN ad_performance ON ads.id = ad_performance.ad_id ORDER BY ad_performance.impressions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, industry FROM advertisers ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT creative_name, format, duration_sec FROM ad_creatives WHERE duration_sec < 30;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, demographics, interests FROM targeting_strategies WHERE strategy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, industry FROM advertisers WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT creative_id, creative_name, format, duration_sec FROM ad_creatives WHERE duration_sec >= 30 AND format = 'Video' ORDER BY creative_name;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, demographics, interests FROM targeting_strategies WHERE interests @> '[{"category": "sports"}]';
